content: **knitted pouch for soap or tawashi with moss stitch in drops paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-776 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the piece measures approx width = 12 cm = 4 3/4 length = 13 cm = 5 1/8 **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g color 29 ice blue 50 g color 17 off white **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 30 row in height with moss stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 needles drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm = us 7 needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller needle size
